name: Jaume Sanz
desc: Jaume es un noi tímid, sempre ho ha estat. A l’escola es ficaven amb ell per ser massa femení i passar tot el dia amb les noies. Avuí en dia es un respectat dissenyador de moda, que ha fet peçes de roba per a moltes marques importants.
descENG: Jaume has always been a shy guy. In school, they used to pick on him for being 'too feminine' and spending all his time with his girl friends. Today, he's a respected fashion designer who has created clothing pieces for many major brands.
